title: My Data Projects
text:
Welcome to my collection of data projects.
Each project showcases my ability to apply R, Python, and Power BI to real-world data â€” from analysis and visualization to building interactive dashboards.





Tools: R, ggplot2, caret, tidyverse
Published on: R Pubs
Overview:
This project explores customer churn behavior using statistical analysis and predictive modeling.
I applied logistic regression and decision tree models to identify key factors influencing customer retention, and visualized the insights using R.
